anime.description: This work dynamically expresses the organic growth and propagation of plants by using geometrical figures. Source: Animation Film Archive

tag.name: experimental animation
tag.description: This anime uses distinct, alternative animation — much unlike other contemporary anime — either throughout or in individual episodes/sequences.

tag.name: black and white
tag.description: Some or all of this anime is in black and white, typical of older anime made before ~1960. Some modern anime may intentionally shift to black and white for certain scenes or episodes as an artistic effect.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.
